paragraph: Kanish Sharma (born 4 July 1992) is an Indian film score composer, music director, singer, and lyricist. He debuted as a film composer in the 2014 Hindi film Babloo Happy Hai directed by Nila Madhab Panda.
"Babloo Happy Hai of Bollywood-film Music Album & Tracks Instant Download; from Times Music Online". Timesmusic.com. Retrieved 15 March 2019.
